DataElement.preferredName: Therapy-Related Acute Myeloid Leukemia Etiology Occurrence Yes No Character Indicator
DataElement.preferredDefinition: The indicator that describes whether or not a particular etiology of therapy-related acute myeloid leukemia occurred.

DataElementConcept.preferredName: Therapy-Related Acute Myeloid Leukemia Etiology Occurrence
DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: An acute myeloid leukemia arising as a result of the mutagenic effect of alkylating agents and/or ionizing radiation.  (WHO, 2001)_The cause of a disease._An instance of something happening, such as an event or incident.

ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: An acute myeloid leukemia arising as a result of the mutagenic effect of alkylating agents and/or ionizing radiation.  (WHO, 2001) -- 2003:The cause of a disease.

Concepts.longName: Acute Myeloid Leukemia Post Cytotoxic Therapy
Concepts.definition: An acute myeloid leukemia arising as a result of the mutagenic effect of chemotherapy agents and/or ionizing radiation.  (WHO, 2001)
The cause of a disease or abnormal condition.

Property.preferredDefinition: Occurrence; an instance of something happening.

Concepts.definition: An instance of something happening, such as an event or incident.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: Specification of human conditions relevant to cancer. This includes observations, test results, history, and other concepts relevant to characterization of human cancer-related conditions. Non-neoplastic conditions of interest are also included.

ValueDomain.preferredDefinition: Indicator of Yes or No to a question.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: The non-affirmative response to a question.

Concepts.definition: The non-affirmative response to a question.

ValueMeaning.changeDescription: Updated to add NCIt concept relationship. Updated VM Short Name to be the Public ID to be consistent with current convention for VM Short Name - DW 10-03-2022
ValueMeaning.administrativeNotes: 2022.12.29 Alt VM added per ticket request CADSR0001837. ak

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: The affirmative response to a question.

Concepts.definition: The affirmative response to a question.

ValueMeaning.administrativeNotes: 2022.12.29 Alt VM added per ticket request CADSR0001837. ak

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: Determination of a value is not relevant in the current context.

Concepts.definition: Determination of a value is not relevant in the current context.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: the results of evaluations of the patient and the patient's disease.

RepresentationTerm.preferredDefinition: An event, entity or condition that typically characterizes a prescribed environment or situation. Indicators determine or aid in determining whether or not certain stated circumstances exist or criteria are satisfied. (On-line Medical Dictionary)

Concepts.definition: An event, entity or condition that typically characterizes a prescribed environment or situation and determines or aids in determining whether certain stated circumstances exist or criteria are satisfied.

ReferenceDocuments.description: Did a particular cause of therapy-related AML occur?
